excerpt: Amusement park located on a pier over the Atlantic Ocean, with rides, a midway & food vendors.
detail_description: Steel Pier is an amusement park situated on a pier extending over the Atlantic Ocean. It offers a variety of rides, a midway, and food vendors. The pier has a rich history as an entertainment destination featuring dances, musical performances, carnival rides, and novelty acts. Notably, it was known for the daring diving horse attraction that ran from the 1920s to the 70s. Additionally, Steel Pier boasts three boardwalk bars with refreshing cocktails and scenic views of the ocean.
name: Steel Pier
address: 1000 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: History museum & state's tallest lighthouse open for climbing with sweeping views of Atlantic City.
detail_description: Absecon Lighthouse, the tallest lighthouse in New Jersey, offers visitors a chance to climb its 228 steps for sweeping views of Atlantic City. The site underwent restoration in the late 1990s and early 2000s, with funding from various organizations. Visitors can explore the two-acre property, visit the Keepers Cottage museum and gift shop, and experience the thrill of ascending to the top of this historic landmark.
name: Absecon Lighthouse
address: 31 S Rhode Island Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Large aquarium featuring underwater exhibits plus an exotic animal show & other rotating events.
detail_description: Located in the Ocean Life Center complex at Gardners Basin, the Atlantic City Aquarium is a popular attraction showcasing over 100 marine animals and fish. Visitors can enjoy interactive exhibits, including a tropical shark touch tank and the Mid-Atlantic Coastal Zone featuring local organisms like horseshoe crabs and sea urchins. The aquarium also houses seahorses, moon jellies, moray eels, and Terrapins.
name: Atlantic City Aquarium
address: 800 N New Hampshire Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Set along the oceanfront, this famous promenade boasts souvenir shops, restaurants & entertainment.
detail_description: The Boardwalk is a renowned promenade located along the oceanfront, featuring souvenir shops, restaurants, and entertainment options. It runs along the Atlantic City and Atlantic and Pacific avenues, offering access to various dining establishments, commercial areas, and entertainment venues that make the city unique. With its beachfront location, visitors can easily partake in the city's dynamic events and attractions.
name: Boardwalk
address: New Jersey, USA

excerpt: Shopping-mall chain featuring a variety of brand-name & designer outlet stores.
detail_description: Tanger Outlets Atlantic City is a popular shopping destination featuring over 60 retail outlets, including well-known brands like Nike, American Eagle, Chico's, H&M, Pandora and Kate Spade New York. The mall offers a variety of designer and brand-name stores at discounted prices. Visitors can also explore nearby shopping venues such as the Quarter at Tropicana and Hamilton Mall in Mays Landing for additional retail options.
name: Tanger Outlets Atlantic City
address: 2014 Baltic Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Enduring 1926 performance center hosting well-known musical acts, sporting events & other shows.
detail_description: Located in Atlantic City, New Jersey, the Jim Whelan Boardwalk Hall is a historic performance center that has been hosting various events since its opening in 1929. This iconic landmark was once the largest building in the world and is home to the world's largest pipe organ with over 33,000 pipes and 1000 keys. The venue hosts major concerts, sporting events, and shows including the Miss America Pageant.
name: Jim Whelan Boardwalk Hall
address: 2301 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Tropicana Casino, located on the Boardwalk in Atlantic City, offers a variety of appealing amenities including a Broadway-style theater and an IMAX cinema. The casino is complemented by a comedy club for entertainment. Additionally, the hotel's proximity to the beach and its wide range of food options make it a popular choice for visitors. While some guests have noted that the parking garage may need improvement, others appreciate its central location near shops and eateries on the boardwalk.
name: Tropicana
address: 2801 S Brighton Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Atlantic City Beach is a wide stretch of soft, camel-hued sands that impresses visitors with its cleanliness and ample space for spreading out. The beach offers various activities such as body boarding, boogie boarding, and wave jumping for kids, while adults can enjoy leisurely walks along the flat terrain near the water or relax in beach chairs.
name: Atlantic City Beach
address: Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Beachside lodging with 2 casinos & nightly entertainment, plus international dining.
detail_description: Bally's Atlantic City Hotel & Casino offers beachside accommodations with two casinos and nightly entertainment, as well as a variety of international dining options. The property features different room styles, including traditional and contemporary interiors in the main building, bright and airy rooms in the Claridge Tower, spacious and environmentally friendly Garden Tower rooms, art deco Bally's Tower rooms, and newly renovated boutique-style Ruby Rooms.
name: Bally's Atlantic City Hotel & Casino
address: 1900 Pacific Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: The New Jersey Korean War Memorial, unveiled in 2000, pays tribute to the courage and sacrifice of New Jersey's soldiers during the Korean War. Situated at Brighton Park near the Boardwalk, it features a striking black granite wall with an eternal flame as a symbol of remembrance for those who perished or went missing. The memorial also includes bronze figures depicting poignant war scenes and a 12-foot tall Mourning Soldier statue holding fallen comrades' dog tags.
name: New Jersey Korean War Memorial
address: 124 Park Pl, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Atlantic City is a resort city on New Jersey's Atlantic coast that's known for its many casinos, wide beaches and iconic Boardwalk. Established in the 1800s as a health resort, today the city is dotted with glitzy high-rise hotels and nightclubs. In addition to gambling at slot machines and table games, the casinos offer spa treatments, performances by famous comedy and music acts, and high-end shopping.
detail_description: Atlantic City, located on the Atlantic coast of New Jersey, is a popular resort destination known for its casinos, expansive beaches, and iconic Boardwalk. Initially established as a health resort in the 1800s, it has transformed into a vibrant city with high-rise hotels and lively nightclubs. Visitors can enjoy gambling at slot machines and table games in addition to indulging in spa treatments, watching performances by renowned comedians and musicians, and exploring upscale shopping options within the casinos.
name: Atlantic City
address: New Jersey, USA

name: 1400 Boardwalk
address: Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Playground Pier is a luxurious shopping destination located by the beach, offering an impressive lineup of retailers including Victoria's Secret, the Apple Store, and Tommy Bahama. Situated near Caesars in Atlantic City, this four-floor luxury mall features world-class brands like Louis Vuitton, Gucci, and Burberry. Visitors can also enjoy renowned dining options such as Buddakan and Phillips Seafood. The pier offers fantastic ocean views and is home to Atlantic City Miniature Golf.
name: Playground Pier
address: One Atlantic Ocean, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Nestled within the iconic Jim Whelan Boardwalk Hall, the Atlantic City Historical Museum is a treasure trove that narrates the fascinating transformation of this vibrant city from its humble beginnings as a fishing village to a bustling resort hotspot. Visitors can immerse themselves in an array of captivating exhibits featuring artifacts, costumes, and photographs that tell stories of yesteryear.
name: Atlantic City Historical Museum
address: 600-698 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: A 1912 landmark, this upscale eatery features steaks, chops & seafood, plus an extensive wine list.
detail_description: Located on the south edge of Atlantic City, the Knife and Fork Inn is a historic upscale eatery that has been serving steaks, chops, and seafood since 1912. The restaurant offers an extensive wine list to complement its classic dishes like Lobster Thermidor.
name: Knife and Fork Inn
address: 3600 Atlantic Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Set along the oceanfront, this famous promenade boasts souvenir shops, restaurants & entertainment.
detail_description: The Boardwalk is a renowned promenade located by the ocean, offering an array of souvenir shops, dining options, and entertainment venues. Visitors can indulge in delectable desserts, award-winning subs, and top-notch pizzas while exploring this iconic destination in Atlantic City.
name: Boardwalk
address: New Jersey, USA

detail_description: Gardner's Basin, located on the north end of Atlantic City, offers a quieter atmosphere with its array of shops and restaurants. Visitors can embark on sightseeing cruises and charter fishing boats from the docks or explore the maritime village and waterfront park. The area is home to original maritime exhibits like the Steel Pier Diving Bell and serves as a departure point for dolphin-sighting cruises. Additionally, visitors can enjoy waterfront dining, stunning views, and unique shopping experiences at Crafters Village.
name: Gardner's Basin
address: 800 N New Hampshire Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Museum with kitschy oddities on display, including shrunken human heads & rare animal skeletons.
detail_description: If you're looking for a quirky adventure in Atlantic City, make sure to stop by Ripley's Believe It or Not! This fascinating museum is home to an array of kitschy oddities that will leave you both amazed and entertained. With over 400 unique exhibits, including shrunken human heads and rare animal skeletons, there's something for everyone to marvel at. The eclectic collection features everything from a lock of George Washington's hair to a stunning 27-room miniature castle carved from wood.
name: Ripley's Believe It or Not!
address: 1441 Boardwalk Corner of Boardwalk and, N New York Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Atlantic City, New Jersey, Little Water Distillery is a must-visit destination for spirit enthusiasts. Open from Thursday to Sunday, this craft distillery specializes in producing an impressive array of spirits including rum, whiskey, vodka, and gin. Just over two miles from the beach and Boardwalk, it offers a perfect spot to unwind with a drink or indulge in tastings while learning about their unique spirit collection.
name: Little Water Distillery
address: mailing address, 810 Lexington Ave. (entrance location, 807 Baltic Ave unit b, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Rock ’n’ roll-themed chain with a high-energy vibe serving burgers & American classics.
detail_description: Hard Rock Cafe is a rock 'n' roll-themed chain known for its high-energy vibe and American classics like burgers. The brand also includes the Rock Spa, offering unique treatments such as the Solid As A Rock deep tissue massage and Will Rock You warm stone massage. With over 30 treatment rooms, including Rhythm & Motion rooms that use bass vibrations for a rhythmic massage journey, guests can indulge in luxury.
name: Hard Rock Cafe Atlantic City
address: 1000 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Sugar Factory in Atlantic City, located inside the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino, is a paradise for dessert lovers. The restaurant and candy store offers an extensive menu of over-the-top sundaes and insane milkshakes that come with pyrotechnics and pumped-in music. It's a kid-friendly space with a fun vibe where both alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks are served with sugary garnishes like candy necklaces, licorice rope, lollipops, and more.
name: Sugar Factory - Atlantic City
address: 1000 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Immerse yourself in the world of ballet at Atlantic City Ballet, located at the Circus Maximus Theatre. Under the direction of acclaimed artistic director Phyllis Papa, this dance company showcases a fusion of classical and contemporary ballet performed by exceptionally talented dancers from around the globe. From timeless classics like Nutcracker to enchanting renditions of Sleeping Beauty, each show is a testament to beauty and artistry.
name: Atlantic City Ballet
address: 2301 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Iconic oceanfront boardwalk featuring views & a variety of shops & restaurants since 1870.
detail_description: The Atlantic City Boardwalk is a historic and iconic oceanfront promenade that has been a popular destination since 1870. It offers stunning views of the ocean and is lined with a diverse selection of shops and restaurants. Visitors can enjoy leisurely strolls, shopping, dining, and soaking in the coastal atmosphere. Additionally, there are various accommodations available near the boardwalk, ranging from cozy cottages to hotels with balconies offering a coastal-inspired ambiance.
name: Atlantic City Boardwalk
address: 2301 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: The Boardwalk Tram Service in Atlantic City is a convenient and affordable way for first-time visitors to explore the iconic Atlantic City Boardwalk. With a hop-on-hop-off service available at a reasonable rate, it's an ideal option for families with young children or older travelers. The tram service offers stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean as it travels from Ocean Casino Resort to Tropicana, making it an enjoyable and informative experience.
name: Boardwalk Tram Service
address: 116 Park Pl, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Contemporary arts center with multiple artists’ studios, classes, a gift shop & a cafe.
detail_description: The Noyes Arts Garage of Stockton University is a vibrant contemporary arts center located in Atlantic City. Established by local entrepreneurs and collectors Fred and Ethel Noyes, the facility features multiple artists' studios, galleries, shops, and a cafe. It also offers educational resources for emerging artists and hosts various special events.
name: The Noyes Arts Garage of Stockton University
address: 2200 Fairmount Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Celebrated stacked subs in an informal counter-serve spot (part of a longtime chain).
detail_description: White House Subs, a long-standing chain, is a must-visit spot in Atlantic City for its iconic stacked subs. Established in 1946, this casual eatery on Arctic Avenue has gained worldwide fame for its mouthwatering hoagies. The signature sub, packed with Italian meats and provolone, is a crowd favorite.
name: White House Subs
address: 2301 Arctic Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Longtime BYOB hideaway supplying traditional, homestyle Italian fare in charming surrounds.
detail_description: Chef Vola's is a long-standing Italian restaurant in New Jersey that offers traditional, homestyle Italian dishes in a charming setting. The restaurant has been serving classic red sauce dishes for over 100 years and is known for its veal parm and pasta. It is a small, intimate, and exclusive dining spot that often caters to regulars, offering a literal home-cooked meal experience in a single-family home setting.
name: Chef Vola's
address: 111 S Albion Pl, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Atlantic City Parasail, located in Gardners Basin near the famous Boardwalk, provides a thrilling and safe parasailing experience for visitors. The fully licensed operator offers custom-designed parasail boat rides for up to 12 people, making it perfect for families seeking an adventure together. With various watersports activities available on the Atlantic Ocean, this attraction is ideal for adrenaline enthusiasts and nature lovers alike. It's recommended to book in advance due to high demand, especially during peak summer season.
name: Atlantic City Parasail
address: 850 N Rhode Island Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Experience the beauty of Atlantic City from a unique perspective with Atlantic City Cruises Inc. Enjoy a tranquil sunset cruise through the marinas and back bays of the Atlantic Ocean, taking in stunning views of the cityscape as day turns into night. Onboard the Cruisn 1, a licensed vessel with panoramic windows and comfortable seating, you can watch Bottlenose dolphins and other marine wildlife up close.
name: Atlantic City Cruises Inc
address: 800 N New Hampshire Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Simple, grassy mini-golf course on the boardwalk with low stone walls, small trees & a snack bar.
detail_description: Atlantic City Miniature Golf is a charming 18-hole course located on the North Beach end of the Atlantic City Boardwalk. This family-owned mini-golf location has been in operation for over twenty years and offers a simple, grassy course with low stone walls and small trees. It's a lovely spot for families to enjoy some outdoor fun while taking in the beautiful landscaping. The course is well-designed, making good use of space to create 18 unique and enjoyable greens.
name: Atlantic City Miniature Golf
address: 1 Kennedy Plz, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: When visiting the Atlantic City Boardwalk, a trip to Fralinger's Original Salt Water Taffy is a must. This iconic treat originated in Atlantic City in the 1880s and was popularized by Joseph Fralinger, who expanded the taffy flavors to an impressive 25 varieties. Alongside Shirvers, another renowned taffy shop, these establishments offer an array of delectable boardwalk treats including fudge and salt water taffy.
name: Fralinger's Original Salt Water Taffy
address: 1901 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: This arts space on a historic city pier offers rotating exhibitions, plus educational programs.
detail_description: Situated on a historic city pier, the Atlantic City Art Center is a unique arts space that showcases rotating exhibitions featuring art from national and regional artists. The center has recently moved to the Jim Whelan Boardwalk Hall but continues to attract visitors seeking a break from the city's commercialism. With its diverse exhibits including photography, sculpture, and paintings, the center offers educational programs and serves as a cultural respite in Atlantic City.
name: Atlantic City Art Center
address: S New Jersey Ave & Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Upscale seafood outfit since 1897 featuring a cozy & elegant dining room with nightly piano music.
detail_description: Dock's Oyster House is an upscale seafood restaurant that has been serving customers since 1897. The restaurant offers a cozy and elegant dining room with nightly piano music, creating a charming and classic atmosphere. It is known for its commitment to serving fresh seafood and has been run by the Dougherty family for four generations.
name: Dock's Oyster House
address: 2405 Atlantic Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: The Quarter at Tropicana is a charming Old Havana-themed shopping center located in the heart of Atlantic City. It offers high-end shops, restaurants, and glitzy nightclubs, making it a must-visit destination for travelers. The Tropicana Casino, which has been standing since 1919 but was fully opened in 1981, is home to this vibrant quarter.
name: The Quarter at Tropicana
address: 2821 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Once segregated, this beach now has a heritage society promoting black culture & unity in the area.
detail_description: Chicken Bone Beach in Atlantic City, New Jersey has a rich history as a once segregated beach for African Americans. Despite its troubling past, the area now boasts a heritage society promoting black culture and unity. Today, visitors can enjoy the wide open space and laid-back vibe of this beach, which is located near popular attractions like the Rainforest Cafe and the Atlantic City Convention Center.
name: Chicken Bone Beach
address: Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Lucky Snake Arcade & Sports Bar at Showboat is a massive 85,000-square-foot entertainment hub that offers a wide array of attractions for visitors of all ages. From classic carnival games like Ramp-Roll-A-Ball and Whac-A-Mole to popular video games, pinball machines, and virtual reality rides, there's something for everyone. The arcade also features mini-golf and a thrilling go-kart raceway where you can reach speeds of up to 25 miles per hour.
name: Lucky Snake Arcade & Sports Bar at Showboat
address: 801 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: The Topgolf Swing Suite offers a unique experience for those looking to play some virtual golf, catch a ball in baseball or take part in other exciting games. There's plenty of room for everyone and the food and drink options are top-notch.
name: TopGolf Swing Suite, Bar & Kitchen
address: 500 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Nestled in a residential area of Atlantic City, The Seed: A Living Beer Project is a must-visit for craft beer enthusiasts. This brewery, which opened during the pandemic and is celebrating its first anniversary this October, offers an impressive selection of over ten unique beers on tap. From dark lagers to dry-hopped saisons and seasonal brews like strawberry saison with wild roses, there's something for every palate.
name: The Seed: A Living Beer Project
address: 807 Baltic Ave Unit 4, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: Rock Spa & Salon at the Hard Rock Hotel in Atlantic City offers a luxurious and rejuvenating experience. With 31 treatment rooms, including specialized rhythm and motion rooms, guests can indulge in massages and facials that incorporate sound vibration. The spa also features spacious sauna and steam rooms, as well as a vitality pool with a heated hydrotherapy tub for relaxation.
name: Rock Spa & Salon
address: 1000 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

detail_description: North Beach Mini Golf & Bike Rentals is a popular spot located at the North Beach end of the Atlantic City Boardwalk. The place offers an array of activities for families and groups, including mini-golf, bike rentals, and an observation wheel overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. Visitors can enjoy boardwalk food favorites and take in stunning views while having fun. The staff is known for their friendly and welcoming attitude, making it a great stop for both locals and tourists alike.
name: North Beach Mini Golf & Bike Rentals
address: 120 Euclid Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

name: Caesars Diamond Lounge
address: 2100 Pacific Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Upscale waterside property featuring around-the-world dining, plus a casino, 6 pools & a theater.
detail_description: Located in the Marina District, Borgata Hotel Casino & Spa is a luxurious property that offers a wide range of amenities. The casino area is spacious and less smoky compared to others in the city, while the rooms are described as spacious and luxurious. The hotel's opulent spa, Tocarre, provides a serene retreat with an Italian-themed setting and a variety of global treatments. Additionally, guests can enjoy around-the-world dining options at the hotel's restaurants.
name: Borgata Hotel Casino & Spa
address: Borgata Hotel, Casino & Spa, 1 Borgata Way, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Ancient-Rome-themed casino lodging with casual rooms & lively dining, plus bars, shops & concerts.
detail_description: Caesars Atlantic City is a hotel and casino with an Ancient Roman theme, offering casual rooms, lively dining options, bars, shops, and concerts. The Qua Baths & Spa at Caesars Atlantic City provides a rejuvenating experience with the Restorative Therapy Ritual that includes essential oil therapy and rhythmic massage. The hotel boasts various amenities such as a rooftop pool, gym, and Roman baths in the spa.
name: Caesars Atlantic City
address: 2100 Pacific Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Casino with gaming tables, slot machines & a poker room at a large hotel resort.
detail_description: Wild Wild West Casino is a vibrant gaming destination located within a large hotel resort. It offers an array of gaming options including tables, slot machines, and a poker room. The casino is known for its excellent decor and features a great bar on the casino floor. Connected to Bally's and Caesars Casinos, it provides access to lively party scenes and entertainment options. Additionally, the casino hosts live shows, DJ performances, and live music sessions for guests to enjoy after indulging in gambling activities.
name: Wild Wild West Casino
address: 2100 Pacific Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Chic rooms & suites in an upmarket oceanfront hotel with a casino, 2 nightclubs & 10 restaurants.
detail_description: Ocean Casino Resort is an upscale oceanfront hotel in Atlantic City, boasting a casino, two nightclubs, and 10 restaurants. The iconic hotel has a rich history and has hosted famous personalities like Marilyn Monroe and Frank Sinatra. With 480 renovated guest rooms and elegant suites offering traditional luxury and stunning ocean views, the resort provides a lavish experience. The 47-story hotel features floor-to-ceiling windows in every room, providing breathtaking ocean backdrops.
name: Ocean Casino Resort
address: 500 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Built in 1922, this landmark, stone rotunda houses a 9-foot-tall bronze statue in memory of WWI.
detail_description: The World War I Memorial in Atlantic City, built in 1922, is a significant landmark featuring a stone rotunda and a 9-foot-tall bronze statue commemorating WWI. Situated within the historic O'Donnell Memorial Park, this memorial serves as a tribute to those who fought and perished during the war. It encompasses various civic memorials, national monuments, private memorials, and war cemeteries that collectively honor the memories of this pivotal moment in history.
name: World War I Memorial
address: 21 S Albany Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Granite columns in a garden honoring the history, events & people of the Civil Rights era.
detail_description: The Civil Rights Garden is a memorial garden completed in 2001, featuring a large fountain and eleven granite columns that provide information about the civil rights movement in New Jersey and across the nation. Costing two million dollars to construct, this significant monument honors African American leaders like Rosa Parks and Frederick Douglass. The garden serves as the first major civil rights monument in a northern state, symbolizing the journey towards equality for Black Americans.
name: Civil Rights Garden
address: Pacific Ave & S Dr Martin Luther King Blvd, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Trendy, late-night pizzeria dishes up classic pies & Italian comfort eats in an old-school interior.
detail_description: Tony's Baltimore Grill is a divey old-school pizza restaurant with delicious Italian comfort food. The staff is excellent and the juke boxes are a nice touch. The only downside is that the food isn't very fancy, but it's definitely worth a visit for classic pies and comfort foods at an affordable price.
name: Tony's Baltimore Grill
address: 2800 Atlantic Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: Unpretentious pit stop for Mexican classics like tacos made with housemade tortillas.
detail_description: Pancho's Mexican Taqueria is a humble yet noteworthy stop for classic Mexican dishes, particularly their housemade tortilla tacos. Despite being located next to the popular White House Subs, this spot stands out with its tender beef tacos and cozy atmosphere. The restaurant gained attention after receiving praise from chef David Chang in Lucky Peach magazine, drawing in locals and tourists alike.
name: Pancho's Mexican Taqueria
address: 2303 Arctic Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

excerpt: High-end, Vegas-style casino nightclub featuring regular DJ nights & bottle service.
detail_description: HQ2 Nightclub at Ocean Casino Resort is a high-end, Vegas-style nightclub located in the heart of Atlantic City. It has been recognized as one of the best nightclubs in the world and features sought-after global DJs, performers, and artists. The venue offers a well-rounded nightly entertainment experience, with the possibility of seeing renowned DJs or even live performances by popular artists. Nestled in Atlantic City's tallest building, HQ2 provides an energetic atmosphere with contemporary vibes and top-notch lights and sound.
name: HQ2 Nightclub at Ocean Casino Resort
address: 500 Boardwalk, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA
